title: Donizetti L'elisir d'amore {Gobbi,Sinimberghi,Corradi}
description:
Gaetano Donizetti  --  L'elisir d'amore (The Elixir of Love) -- Film-opera

Libretto by Felice Romani, based on the libretto by
Eugene Scribe for Daniel Francois Auger's Le Philtre.
The premiere of Eiisirwas at theTeatro della Canobbiana,
Milan, May 12,1832.
Filmed in 1947

Nemorino .. . Gino Sinimberghi
Adina ... Nelly Corradi
Bclcore ... Tito Gobbi
Dulcamara . .. Italo Tajo
Giannetta ... Loretta di Lelio
Chorus and Ballet of the Teatro dell' Opera of Rome
Orchestra of RAI
Gina Lollobrigida is in the chorus.
Giuseppe Morelli, conductor
Mario Costa, director
